original_text: Those people include the Egyptians, the Edomites, the Ammonites, the Moabites and the people of Judah. I will also punish the people who live in the desert and who cut their hair short. Those people are not circumcised to give honour to me. The Israelites are the same. Their bodies are circumcised, but they do not want to obey my covenant with them.’ Those people include the Egyptians, the Edomites, the Ammonites, the Moabites and the people of Judah. I will also punish the people who live in the desert and who cut their hair short. Those people are not circumcised to give honour to me. The Israelites are the same. Their bodies are circumcised, but they do not want to obey my covenant with them.’ Those people include the Egyptians, the Edomites, the Ammonites, the Moabites and the people of Judah. I will also punish the people who live in the desert and who cut their hair short. Those people are not circumcised to give honour to me. The Israelites are the same. Their bodies are circumcised, but they do not want to obey my covenant with them.’
korean_text: 곧 애굽과 유다와 에돔과 암몬 자손과 모압과 및 광야에 살면서 살쩍을 깎은 자들에게라 무릇 모든 민족은 할례를 받지 못하였고 이스라엘은 마음에 할례를 받지 못하였느니라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: the Edomites, the Ammonites, the Moabites
sentences.korean_translation: 에돔 사람들, 암몬 사람들, 모압 사람들

sentences.original_text: I will also punish the people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 그 사람들을 벌할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: and who cut their hair short.
but they do not want to obey
